title: Build Creatives Request
description: Request to build creatives from a portfolio's source assets. Creative agent uses the portfolio's assets, brand manifest, and trackers to generate ready-to-serve ad tags.

portfolio_id.description: Creative set containing source assets and trackers

prompt.description: Optional natural language guidance for creative generation. If omitted, uses the portfolio's generation_prompt.

asset_ids.description: Optional subset of asset IDs to use. If omitted, creative agent selects appropriate assets.

auto_approve.description: If true, built creatives are automatically approved. If false, they require advertiser review.
